get.description: Fetch an album using its identifier.

parameters.name: storefront
parameters.description: An iTunes Store territory, specified by an ISO-Alpha2 country code. The possible values are the id attributes of Storefront objects.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the album.

parameters.name: l
parameters.description: The localization to use, specified by a language tag. The possible values are in the `supportedLanguageTags` array belonging to the `Storefront` object specified by storefront. Otherwise, the storefrontâs `defaultLanguageTag` is used.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Additional relationships to include in the fetch.

get.description: Fetch one or more albums using their identifiers.

parameters.name: storefront
parameters.description: An iTunes Store territory, specified by an ISO-Alpha2 country code. The possible values are the id attributes of Storefront objects.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the album.

parameters.name: l
parameters.description: The localization to use, specified by a language tag. The possible values are in the `supportedLanguageTags` array belonging to the `Storefront` object specified by storefront. Otherwise, the storefrontâs `defaultLanguageTag` is used.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Additional relationships to include in the fetch.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: The unique identifiers for the albums

contentRating.description: The RIAA rating of the content. The possible values for this rating are clean and explicit. No value means no rating.

editorialNotes.description: The notes about the album that appear in the iTunes Store.

genreNames.description: The names of the genres associated with this album.

isComplete.description: Indicates whether the album is complete. If true, the album is complete; otherwise, it is not. An album is complete if it contains all its tracks and songs.

isSingle.description: Indicates whether the album contains a single song.

name.description: The localized name of the album.

recordLabel.description: The name of the record label for the album.

releaseDate.description: The release date of the album in YYYY-MM-DD format.

playParams.description: The parameters to use to playback the tracks of the album.

url.description: The URL for sharing an album in the iTunes Store.

artists.description: The artists associated with the album.

tracks.description: The songs and music videos on the album.
